snippet.title: TANGLEDEEP: Early Access Trailer (16-bit Roguelike Dungeon Crawler)
snippet.description:
An old-school dungeon crawling, roguelike RPG inspired by the finest games of the 16-bit / SNES era. Developed by Andrew Aversa / Impact Gameworks (code, design, audio) and available SOON on Steam Early Access! http://store.steampowered.com/app/628770

(To be clear - I'm not just making the music to this, I'm creating the entire game! With the help of some amazing pixel artists, of course!) 


http://www.tangledeep.com/
https://twitter.com/TangledeepGame/
http://www.impactgameworks.com/
